summary.span: Gets or sets a value indicating whether *direct access* to the WMI provider is requested for the specified class, without any regard to its super class or derived classes.

span.span: Gets or sets a value indicating whether *direct access* to the WMI provider is requested for the specified class, without any regard to its super class or derived classes.

value.span: 返回值，该值指示是否 * 直接访问 * 到 WMI 提供程序为请求指定的类。

span.span: Returns a value indicating whether *direct access* to the WMI provider is requested for the specified class.

remarks.format: ## Remarks ## 属性值Property Value `true` 如果仅指定类的对象应接收，而不考虑派生或继承;否则为`false`。`true` if only objects of the specified class should be received, without regard to derivation or inheritance; otherwise, `false`. 默认值为 `false`。The default value is `false`. ## .NET Framework 安全性.NET Framework Security 对直接调用方的完全信任。Full trust for the immediate caller. 此成员不能由部分信任的代码使用。This member cannot be used by partially trusted code. 有关详细信息，请参阅[通过部分受信任的代码使用库](~/docs/framework/misc/using-libraries-from-partially-trusted-code.md)。For more information, see [Using Libraries from Partially Trusted Code](~/docs/framework/misc/using-libraries-from-partially-trusted-code.md). ## Examples 下面的示例初始化变量替换构造函数，然后获取 WMI 类及其子类别的所有实例。The following example initializes an variable with an constructor and then gets all the instances of a WMI class and its subclasses. remarks.format: ## Remarks 如果说明和其他修正的信息不感兴趣，请将此属性的值设置为`false`更高效。If descriptions and other amended information are not of interest, setting this property value to `false` is more efficient. ## 属性值Property Value `true` 如果从返回的对象 WMI 应包含修正的信息;否则为`false`。`true` if the objects returned from WMI should contain amended information; otherwise, `false`. 默认值为 `false`。The default value is `false`. ## .NET Framework 安全性.NET Framework Security 对直接调用方的完全信任。Full trust for the immediate caller. 此成员不能由部分信任的代码使用。This member cannot be used by partially trusted code. 有关详细信息，请参阅[通过部分受信任的代码使用库](~/docs/framework/misc/using-libraries-from-partially-trusted-code.md)。For more information, see [Using Libraries from Partially Trusted Code](~/docs/framework/misc/using-libraries-from-partially-trusted-code.md).
